name: One Shot Pongquest
description:
How To Play:

Move the mouse to shift the paddles.

Left Mouse Click to grab the Ball and to release it. 

Your battalion is on it's last ressources. After fighting countless battles you stand before a new challenge; you only have one cannon ball left. 

Made for GJL Game Parade Summer 2021 with the Theme: One Time Use.
I tried to implement it into the narration, even if it's abit of a stretch. Still I had a lot of fun and learned a ton of new stuff while working on it.

Music: 

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-level-music-mug-stage-sewer-pipes-undergro...

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-chiptune-lost-in-hyperspace

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-battle-loop

Sound:

https://dominik-braun.net/retro-sounds/

https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
